content: these casual crochet pants are fun to make and perfect for lounging around the house in comfort and style stitched in red heart super saver ombre watch colors change for you in a soft ombre pattern as you crochet in rounds from the top down focusing on doing simple half_double_crochet to create your garment take extra care to match the stripes on both legs for a professional finish materials red heart® super saver® ombre™ 10 oz/283 g 482 yds/440 m true blue 3962 sizes xs/s m/l xl 2/3xl 4/5xl 3 4 4 5 6 balls finished hip measurement xs/s 34 86 5 cm m/l 38 96 5 cm xl 44 112 cm 2/3xl 52 132 cm 2/3xl 58 1472 5 cm
